src:
FOTO: V vreči prevažal 250 zamrznjenih ptic
Ptice naj bi bile nezakonito ulovljene v Romuniji.
06 Nov 2019, 20:30 by T. V.
MURSKA SOBOTA – V nedeljo malo po poldnevu je Furs policijo obvestil, da imajo v postopku državljana Italije, ki v osebnem avtomobilu prevaža zamrznjene ptice zaščitenih vrst. Z zbiranjem obvestil je bilo ugotovljeno, da je bil 59-letni Italijan zaustavljen na pomurski avtocesti na relaciji Pince–Murska Sobota. V hladilni vreči je prevažal okrog 250 zamrznjenih ptic v skupni masi 7083 gramov. Po zbranih obvestilih ptice izvirajo iz zakonitega lova v Romuniji.Kriminalisti sektorja kriminalistične policije PU še zbirajo obvestila in čakajo na ekspertizo Arsa o vrstni pripadnosti in predpisih, s katerimi so ptice zavarovane. Ptice so bile predane v hrambo veterinarsko higienski službi. Po pridobljenem mnenju bo podano poročilo (ali kazenska ovadba) na ODT Murska Sobota.
text:
PHOTO: Carrying 250 Frozen Birds in a Bag
The birds were allegedly caught illegally in Romania.
06 Nov 2019, 20:30 by T.V.
MURDAY SATURDAY - On Sunday shortly after noon, Furs informed police that they were in the process of being an Italian citizen transporting frozen birds of protected species in a passenger car. Collecting information, it was found that the 59-year-old Italian had been stopped on the Pomurje highway between Pince-Murska Sobota. It carried around 250 frozen birds in a total of 7083 grams in a refrigerated bag. According to the collected information, the birds originate from legal hunting in Romania. Criminals of the Criminal Police Sector of the PU are still collecting notices and awaiting the expertise of Ars on the species affiliation and regulations with which the birds are protected. The birds were handed over to the veterinary and hygiene service for storage. According to the obtained opinion, a report (or criminal complaint) will be submitted to the Murska Sobota Police Station.
